DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare bioequivalence test formulation zolpidem tartrate tablet equivalent oral dose commercially available reference drug product Ambien速 ( zolpidem tartrate tablet ) adult subject fast condition . Thirty-eight healthy , non-smoking , non-obese male female volunteer least 18 year age randomly assign crossover fashion receive two zolpidem tartrate dose regimen sequence 7 day washout period dose period . On morning Day 1 , overnight fast least 10 hour , subject receive either single oral dose test formulation , zolpidem tartrate ( 1 x 10 mg tablet ) single oral dose reference formulation , Ambien速 ( 1 x 10 mg tablet ) . After 7 day washout period , morning Day 8 overnight fast , subject receive alternate regimen . Blood sample draw participant dose 12 hour post dose time sufficient adequately define pharmacokinetics zolpidem tartrate . A goal study evaluate safety tolerability regimen healthy volunteer . Subjects monitor throughout confinement portion study adverse reaction study drug and/or procedure . Blood pressure pulse rate obtain prior dose 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 4 12 hour post-dose . All adverse event whether elicited query , spontaneously report observed clinic staff evaluate investigator report subject 's case report form .

History malignancy , stroke , diabetes , cardiac , renal liver disease , serious illness . History GERD , malabsorption syndrome , colon cancer , chronic colitis , include Crohn 's disease . History treatment asthma within past five ( 5 ) year . History mental depression . History pulmonary disease . History sleep apnea . Females pregnant lactating .
